title: 2016 A new year a new chapter
text:
I love nature an I love life.
I want to find the right one for me. She is not perfect but she is to me. I want my soulmate. 

If I had a wish it would be to find my soulmate first and foremost! What is a soulmate? Well for me it would be someone I have things in common with
so we can spend time together and laugh and enjoy life the way it was intended to be lived. She would be my best friend, some one who knows everything about me and instead of judgment they love you unconditionally. 
She would communicate each day or throughout the day sharing conversation about their day or that I miss you! She is someone who is not perfect but has grown and learned from past experiences. She would be somewhat spiritual and we are able to share conversation about our beliefs. She is outgoing and loves to go for adventure, explore by going on road trips or Weekend getaways. Maybe a cruise or a trip
to an island, or maybe it's up to the mountains. 

She will be down to earth. She is active and doesn't mind going for long walks holding hands. She may like to play tennis or golf or bike ride. She loves to cook beside her partner in the kitchen while maybe being a little frisky and flirtatious. She would love to be with her man intimately often as two share the love
and close connection that is needed for a loving  relationship. She loves getting gifts on occasion or notes left for her saying how much I'm in love with you.
My soulmate loves nature in all its forms. She lives for today and understands that negativity is wasted energy so she is a positive person. She loves to share her feelings and emotions. She loves to kiss and cuddle on the couch listening to music or watching a movie.

You see I don't think that finding this person is
impossible. And some may look at this profile and say she doesn't exist. I disagree. My journey has taken me here and through the chapter's of my life that I have written so far and the experience and wisdom has taught me is have faith! Don't settle. She lives she breaths and she is waiting for me. I do hope that each and everyone finds their soulmate. And who knows maybe it may just me. :)





Sent from my Verizon Wireless 4G LTE smartphone

"I have known him longer than I have known some of my relatives. Thankfully I enjoy his company more than most of them too lol! He is easily the nicest and generous person I have ever met. He has heart big enough for a bear.

He values the friendship and companion side of a relationship above all. He understands that looks can fade and it's the heart of a person that keeps you coming home to them. He gives 10 fold what he takes and he takes great pride in this. For him being fulfilled means taking care of someone else and sharing all facets of his life with that person. The good. . ...and the bad.

So let's talk about the bad. . .is it wrong I'm excited about this? I found the love of my life on here so I have been around the block on match searching and hunting. The ONE thing that drove me nuts is the lack of honesty. After all people want to know what the hell they are getting themselves into. He doesn't have many faults but we all have some.. He also lacks a little bit of self-confidence. . ..again. . . a common trait. I never understood why as he seriously is one of the greatest people I have ever known. Honestly that's about it really. . .oh and he has been known to wake the dead on occasion snoring but it's not a nightly thing...typically its associated with the albeit rare drinking bender. . . HEY DON'T JUDGE WE ALL HAVE BEEN THERE.

So all in all anyone that locks this pony down is getting themselves a hell of a guy and I can tell you we are a rare F*&^%#$ breed ladies."


I agreed to not change anything he wrote about me but I must contest the "cranky" thing. I am not THAT bad. I just have a low tolerance for stupidity ?

Overall what I am really looking for in someone is a companion and someone I can really get along with. . title: Can I Find you Here?? A Long Shot BUT.. Pls Read.
text:
Please accept my thanks in advance for reading my posting.
A Single Black Male Searching For True Love And Understanding...
5'11 230 Fit, Dimples, Bald Head, And A Few Tats.. Heart Of Gold
And I know this is A LONG SHOT... But they say have faith of a mustard seed...
I'm currently is in Atlanta But love to travel and thinking outside of my box..
Hope not a deal breaker.. I do have a kid in Chicago and have lived and worked till recently laid off
and very open to moving back and will be traveling there often.. Or you may be 
Tired of the cold winters and Atlanta Ga sounds good to you..

My goal is to find someone whom I don't want to be without for the rest of my life, as opposed to finding someone whom I want to be with right now.


I am a hopeful romantic who believes that the right two people can bring out the best in each other, as they complement each other, and their relationship will be synergistic. I wish to find a lady whose values are similar to my own; and who also believes that a monogamous long-term relationship is based on respect; love; trust; honest, open and frequent communications; and faith. I wish to find a lady who wants to create an opportunity together; who wants to share life's journey, with its excitement and uncertainty; who appreciates what a loving relationship offers, and that just like a beautiful garden, it takes tending to maintain, and to make it grow; and finally, who is right at home applying the philosophy of "adjust and adapt" to make things better for our life together. I am also one who greatly enjoys holding hands, hugging, cuddling, and sharing long, loving and passionate kisses with the woman that I love. I am one who is not short on affection, and believe strongly that one receives even more than one gives in this regard.

I am a service oriented person, especially to the lady in my life. I greatly enjoy doing things with and for others; and am a firm believer that one receives much more than one gives through service. For example, I greatly enjoy helping in the kitchen with cooking, and view it as both a pleasurable entity onto itself, as it a great creative outlet; as well as a means of service to others, especially to the lady in my life. While it may sound silly, I think that putting your arm around someone and giving them a kiss on the check while they are cooking is a very pleasurable experience. And, I like to have it done to me as well. 

My philosophy about life is simple: be passionate about what you do and enjoy life and love to the fullest I will listen to almost anything music is my passion I love anything from soft rock to trap music a good bottle of wine, good food, good company and a good laugh is my idea of a great evening, either with my loving lady. For as much as I enjoy doing things with and for others, and being out with other people, I also greatly enjoy the individual company of the lady in my life, to dedicating time just to be with her, and to continue to develop that intimate relationship between us. I am equally comfortable getting dressed up and going out for an evening as I am staying at home, watching movies and eating freshly popped popcorn while cuddling and holding the love of my life in my arms.

I am very logical, and action-oriented; yet also very loving, passionate, loyal and driven to build and nurture relationships. I am also a problem solver, not a problem generator; I tend to see the glass as half full; and I'm one who tries to diffuse conflict as opposed to being disagreeable and arguing. In my humble opinion, life is simply too short to waste one's emotional energy on needless things. Words that describe me are respectful, open, honest, sincere, communicative, trusting, caring, affectionate, loving, passionate, sensual, energetic, and fun loving. I also possess a bit of a dry/witty/ sense of humor. I can also be very quiet and laid back about what I do, and how I do it...

I am a person who believes that "backwards is not an option," and who tends to take a "nothing ventured, nothing gained" and "you never know until you try" type approach to life. I am a "what you see is what you get" type person, and I say what I mean and mean what I say. For as much as I can be an intellectual, I tend to write from the heart, as I find that to be very reflective of my soul.


I Always been the Bad Boy/ Gentleman type. I've been in business for myself mostly.. Co owner of a record label and I attracted all the lost boys! kinda like a modern day Robin Hood and we created a lot of unwanted drama in our lives some people would call us a group of ruff necks or organized criminals. I was always very popular I got whatever I wanted. I dated the wrong types and partied nonstop. I was always financially secure or better than that I was well off I never missed a party some people would say I was the party. I stayed in trouble with the law and I guess the more trouble I got in the more popular I became. I was always surrounded by dozens of people but yet always alone. I became the King of a world that was full of fake people and I myself was the fakest of all. I lost myself and it took along time to realize just how fake everyone in that world is.

I helped put Atlanta on the map with Hip/Hop-Rap way before Outkast, Godie Mob, Lil Jon, Luda, Future Kilo and others but I had working relation with them early in their careers.. I had nothing real and I had abandoned the people who truly mattered. I was not being a true father to my kids and I was betraying myself because I wasn't allowing the good things to be part of my life. So one day I woke up I decided I wanted more and I knew it was time to make a change but I didn't know how? I decided to leave everything and everybody I knew and make a fresh start I decided it was time to start being the man I needed to be and to stop playing basically it was time to grow up and it was also time to be the father I had never been I want to find someone that is real, loving and understanding. I want a normal life that I can be proud of like a loving family that is grounded with morals and values.. I am very passionate and very loyal and committed man to the people I care for I have just spent to much time caring for the wrong people. And I think out of the East! Free And Accepted Mason.. Boaz! I am a type A person and I had it all but I walked away to find what to me means much more and that is someone real to share a normal purpose driven life with.

The script of my life has been rewritten, and I am now moving into the next phase of my life, which is something that I had never envisioned. However, Life experiences has taught me to "adjust and adapt," I will not let my current situation define me or hold me back. Rather, I will rise above it and move forward. To be specific, my life is in transition due to two reasons. First, Change and New Challenges Transition, I also presume that anyone I meet is also interested in starting a serious relationship and seeing where it goes. As such, I don't view my current situation as an impediment to starting a relationship that could became long term and that potentially could lead to marriage.

My desire is to get together and to have a conversation, as I greatly respect and enjoy the company of a lady. My intent is to get out and about, and to do so in a way that keeps expenses down given my present situation. I was recently laid off "But I was lucky to find a job already" God is good! and is in the process of moving back to Ga from DC area.. Even though living comfortable is ideal.. I have had some life challenges so if you are after material gains I'm not for you.. I have great vision regarding where a relationship can go; however, I do have a great deal of self-respect, integrity, honor and morals, and a great deal of respect for others, and know better than to engage in behaviors that are destructive to a relationship. Some may call that old-fashioned, however; that's okay with me, as I believe that that chivalry is not dead!

As I expressed previously, I wish to find a lady whose values are similar to my own; and I am going to remain very open relative to whom I meet at this stage of my life.. I am a nonsmoker (of any kind); drug and disease free; neat, clean and organized; and am only interested in someone who is also a nonsmoker; who is both drug and disease free; who is not a drama queen; who is not into mind games; or who is messy, unkempt or disorganized, So having a great personality being sexy, fit
loving and very understanding career driven is key!
B.. A.. S.. I.. C.. S... L.. O.. V.. E..

B- be who you are
A- appreciate your partner
I- invest time in building a foundation, Rome was not built in 1 day.
C- communicate, compromise & cherish each other
S- share your goals with each other and strive to live life with each other build a empire
~
L- love unconditionally, with no regrets ever
O- open your mind to a partner's opinion and respect them as an individual
V- value GOD and have a place for him
E- embrace the beauty that a couple shares with all the good and bad ~ enjoy the journey 




If what has been expressed above is of interest to you, or has struck a chord with you, then please reply and tell me a little bit about yourself, namely tell me something about your life story. And please don't respond and say something along the lines of "tell me more about yourself," as I believe that I have discussed quite lot about myself already. If you are interested in me, it's your turn to write to me! Please know that I will read and respond to what you write about yourself and your situation. A picture with your reply would be greatly appreciated, as would a description of yourself, so please be real. Also, please put the phrase "LOVING" in the subject line to weed out spam.
AGE AND RACE IS NO ISSUE! "IF YOU DONT HAVE TIME TO INVEST... DON'T REPLY"

title: Maximum Effort!
text:
You're amazing if you know where my title is from. If not I won't hold it against you, I'll just have to properly inform you :)

I've only been using Craigslist for a few days, knowing full well the odds were stacked against me in trying to make a real connection with someone. I'm almost resigned to the fact that my attempts are futile. But at this point I have to keep rolling with the punches and trying. Sometimes conversations here start with a fire and end in a whimper. Anything worth doing wasn't meant to be easy.

It's been two years since I've been in a relationship. It was very complicated to say the least, but it left a mark on my character that forever changed me. Often I look in the mirror hoping to like what's staring back at me. Being able to look myself in the eyes and know that I'm doing the best I can to be a good man, with a half-decent soul. It's often hard when past memories come rushing in and I'm reminded of harder times. I'm often hard on myself. Others say too hard, but it's what keeps me humble, respectable, and most importantly honorable. I'm a man of my word. If I give you my word it means something to me.

Life seems to be moving so fast these days. Friends don't often have the time they used to for conversations that would mean the world to me. My friends would give me the strength I need to carry on with life and be the leader most of them look up to. I feel the weight of the world on my shoulders some times. I never get the chance to break down and really let out raw emotion. I haven't since I was last with someone. I miss being able to be me 100% without holding back.

I'm turning 27 next month (March), so hopefully not too far away from your age that would bother you. I think you can get a sense of my maturity at this point and a sense of responsibility to not let age bother you. I often tend to be quiet when I first meet people. I like to observe people's behavior and then make my move into being social, which I have no fear of doing. I'm an introverted-extrovert I guess you could say? I like to listen. It's something I've done well for years.

I work very long hours for a law firm. I manage a staff of paralegals and work closely with our lawyers in our day-to-day operations. It's been 12-hour days Mon-Fri. Things should start to settle down and my hours should start to return to normal. We had a lot of transitioning going on. My work has only made it that much more difficult to meet someone.

I'm HWP, single, Caucasian, blond, blue eyes, 5'10" and somewhere around 130lbs. I have a slender frame, but I have an athletic build. I've always remained active since childhood. I have several tattoos on my body, so I hope body art doesn't phase you. My suit covers all of them during the day, so I remain professional in the work place. I like to socially drink, but I have never done any type of drug in my life and don't intend to.

I love to eat, love dogs, don't mind cats, being outside, especially at night when the world takes on another form of life. I absolutely love and adore film. Books are great as well. I like to write in my spare time. Just musings. I wouldn't be a boy without his video games, but don't worry, I know how to put down a controller. I love to watch and participate in sports, but it's not a priority in my life as much as it once was when compared to my teenage years. Put on some good tunes and pour me a glass of whiskey and we'll have ourselves a good time.

I'm absolutely real. It's Sunday and 52 degrees out. Post your favorite TV Show in the subject line of the email so I know you're real as well. Your picture gets mine.

title: What makes you tick?
text:
This site has the been the basis of my sex and dating life for well over a decade. It's funny how you'll come across the same people here and on the shitty free dating sites still looking like they've always been, wondering why they can't, "find the right guy". The Internet is like this giant social experiment in its infancy and we're the first generation of guine pigs. As far as relationships go, I don't think it's going so well. "But my friend found her husband online and they're living happily ever after." Yes, your one individual example discounts the argument just like witnessing one, improbable coincidence proves it was, "God's grace". 

It's ok you're dysfunctional. It's ok the true love fantasy isn't in your cards. It's not really in anyone's, you just believe believe in fairytales at an advanced age. In reality a relationship is just an intricate game of give and take. In some the ratio is very lopsided and in others, it's pretty even. 

I'm a good guy in the fact that I'm never going to beat you. I'm never going to be cruel or scare you. I'd be nice to your kids. I wouldn't steal from or take advantage of you. I'm not going to fuck some random slut in your bed while you're at work. 

What scares and sickens me is that's a glowing endorsement to so many stupid women these days. Well, that's what they say they want, but invariably they'll find another scary, white trash junky just waiting for an opportunity to be alone with her 13 yo daughter. 

I'm not proud of much. I did have a very good thing going in life at one point, but in the end I was still me and that's what I couldn't handle. I can't regret the past or the choices I made because that person was bound to fuck things up one way or another. I think our free will is more of an illusion that we want to believe. We're objectively very predictable from a macro standpoint. More of a fixed track than an open road. 

I'm not bitter at the reality, I'm angry at the bullshit I was fed. I thought I could help someone change when in reality they're going to keep making the same mistakes until it kills them. I thought I was "in love" when in actuality it was a self-destructive obsession. I knew she was full of shit, batshit crazy, opiate dependent, non trustworthy, manipulative, self serving and incredibly immature. Like the emotional intelligence of a bratty, spoiled little girl. But who the fuck am I? Right? 

The misogynistic side of me will scold battered women for being so stupid for repeatedly subjecting themselves to the abuse. Then I realized how my situation paralleled theirs, I just didn't have any cuts or bruises jumping out at anyone. The damage was purely on my mental health and self worth as opposed to the wholistic approach the woman beaters use. 

I'm fat, dysfunctional, I don't fully support myself, not too much going on in any facet of my life, undereducated, and difficult to employ. If I'm not constantly checking and challenging my thoughts I'm a cruel knowitall. I'm fully able to get it together, I just don't know if it sounds worthwhile. That the incremental amount of happiness it'd bring is worth the risk or headache. 

Seriously, I'm not your existential anti-hero and I'd hold it against you if you were into me. I don't think I have too much to worry about 😊

*edit- I just proofread what I wrote and yes, I'm cringing every other sentence as well.

title: Intellectual Seeks Same
text:
Hi there, I've decided to try putting my wishes out here into the CL universe in the hope of meeting a truly compatible lady. Despite the incredible sleaze factor, I know there are lonely, bored people such as myself who click through these posts in the wee hours, perhaps fantasizing about hitting the lottery of the dating game and finding that perfect match. Well, here is an authentic potential "dream come true" for the right lady.

Who is that right lady? Well, I think it's unrealistic to expect to meet someone who fits an exact list of criteria. I've been with women who had all the attributes I thought were "essential" at the time, but there are intangible qualities that maybe only exist in the chemistry between two people. So I think it's better to be surprised; to hope to meet someone unexpected. Someone whom I couldn't have imagined because I've never met someone like her before. At our age people tend to think they've seen it all, which is a shame. If you've seen it all then why go on?

I think a minimal compatibility list would amount to: someone like me who could like someone like me. So let me list what I believe to be my desirable qualities:

Intelligent

Hence the title of this post. In the long run most of what we do together involves talking and sharing ideas. I'm very honest, straightforward, and compassionate. I like to talk and I like being quiet. I think conversation is the heart of a good relationship. So someone who is smart enough to recognize and respect my intelligence, and can offer me the same in return, would be essential. I'm pretty well rounded, having travelled physically as well as spiritually. I'm interesting, funny, and insightful. I have lots of stories and I'd like to hear yours.

Horny

Just as important as intelligence. Yeah, yeah, yeah... I know, crude, vulgar, "just like all the other guys". Well, yes and no; but if this is your attitude about sex you may not like me. I'm the attentive lover some women dream of. My hands and lips will be on you often. If this doesn't work for you then we have nothing more to discuss. No more cold fish in my life, thank you.

This doesn't mean I'll be impatient to bed you though. I need a level of comfort and intimacy before I can get naked with someone. Sometimes this comes quickly, sometimes it takes a while. We don't even need to discuss it before you're ready, but this is your advance warning. If you respond to this post I'm going to assume you've read it and know that I'm only interested in an uninhibited, reciprocal partner. Someone I can't wait to see because I know she can't wait to see me. If this makes your heart flutter then give serious thought to responding to this post immediately.

Attractive

Yes, beauty is in the eye of the beholder, and I do have eclectic tastes, so I'm not ruling any possibilities out. I do however think that couples should "look right" together. A man who's not that good looking shouldn't be with a woman that every guy looks at, and vice versa. But looks are subjective; some think I'm gorgeous and others are unimpressed. The basic stats:

5' 7" tall - about 150 lbs
Brown hair, brown eyes, and a "classic profile" (which I can't see but have been complimented on)
I'm Mixed Ethnicity
Usually dress casual, neat and clean. But clothes look good on me for some reason. If I wear a shirt with a collar I look "dressed up". I tend to favor solid colors and a no-frills style.

The women I usually find attractive are around 5' 4" tall and let's say, 140 lbs or so. I like a woman who wears heels (in bed at least, if nowhere else). Not hard and fast rules, but generally what I find attractive. If you qualify as "sexy" (meaning guys notice you on the street) then I might find your looks appealing. I'm not that fussy, and I like "quirky" good looks as well as "classic". So sending a photo with your reply is the best way to find out. You will get mine in return.

I don't want to sound too arrogant, but I am a fairly handsome man, so if you're not at least "pretty" then please don't put me on the spot. You don't have to be gorgeous, but at least be pretty.

Beyond the above...

Okay... covered the "essentials" of brains, sexuality, and looks. What else?

Good heartedness!

I'm a good guy. I'm honest and forthcoming. I'm kind to children and animals.
I don't like to argue and don't want to be involved with someone who has a violent temper or regularly raises her voice. If you can't have a reasonable discussion about an issue that needs to be resolved without raising your voice, then you're not someone I can be around. I'm not saying that impassioned expression is forbidden, but there's a limit. If you're shouting you're definitely not listening, and violence is not always physical.

Other facts

Since I haven't said it outright, I will say it here: I am single... very, very single.
One woman man looking for a one man woman.
I live alone in The West Loop and Work in Downtown Chicago
I have a car and I'm willing to travel

And where is this all leading?

Well... I'm a relationship kinda guy and monogamous by nature. I'm happiest when I'm involved with one woman, and one woman is all I have the capacity for dealing with at a time. I'd love to find the love of the rest of my life, but I don't want to approach you with expectations of any kind. My last relationship was 90% wonderful for 2 years until that last 10% became such an issue that we had to part. So let's just say that what I really want is someone to live with forever and ever, and that I'm willing to make the investment of time and emotion to make that happen. I want to love and be loved, but this can not be planned, only hoped for. I'm willing to try and, hopefully, what you read here will show that I'm sincere.

What to do now...

Well - Write me. No need to be as verbose as I am here. I don't care to have an extensive written correspondence. I'd like to get to know a bit about you via email and phone, then meet in the near future. If you have "other irons in the fire" (meaning, other guys you're currently flirting with) I think it's best you decide to do them or drop them before you start flirting with me. Even at the dating stage, I can only focus on one woman at a time, and I don't like being in a competition. If I want a second date with you, that means I see a potential that I want to pursue, and I will play that out to the end before my interests drift towards another woman. So put your juggling aside for a moment if you're going to pique my interest.

I understand if you don't want to send a picture right away, but don't waste my time either. I will want to see what you look like before even talking on the phone. And if you have this "thing" about where your picture goes out in the world, get over it. It's just a picture - if you have nothing to hide then don't hide anything. I went on one dating site and they used my picture countless times. I felt violated at first, but then I realized - so what? This is the world we live in. Facebook knows more about you than your mother ever did. I'm not Facebook, not a "picture collector", I just want to see the face and figure that go along with the words before I start getting interested in a woman's mind. Fair enough?

Well... thanks for reading. Expect this post to be available until someone suitable finds me.

Have fun and be safe.

title: Public Service Announcement
text:
I like to think that I am a man enough for you.

I am a man and I do things just like any other man.


Because I'm a man, when I lock my keys in the car, I will fiddle with a coat hanger long after hypothermia has set in. Calling the AAA is not an option. I will win. 
Because I'm a man, when the car isn't running very well, I will pop the hood and stare at the engine as if I know what I'm looking at. If another man shows up, one of us will say to the other, "I used to be able to fix these things, but now with all these computers and everything, I wouldn't know where to start." We will then drink a couple of beers, as a form of holy communion. 
Because I'm a man, when I catch a cold, I need someone to bring me soup and take care of me while I lie in bed and moan. You're a woman. You never get as sick as I do, so for you, this is no problem. 

Because I'm a man, I can be relied upon to purchase basic groceries at the store, like milk or bread. I cannot be expected to find exotic items like "cumin" or "tofu." For all I know, these are the same thing.
Because I'm a man, when one of our appliances stops working, I will insist on taking it apart, despite evidence that this will just cost me twice as much once the repair person gets here and has to put it back together. Because I'm a man, I must hold the television remote control in my hand while I watch TV. If the thing has been misplaced, I may miss a whole program looking for it...though one time I was able to survive by holding a calculator...(applies to engineers mainly). 
Because I'm a man, there is no need to ask me what I'm thinking about. The true answer is always either sex, hunting, sex, cars, sex, tractors, sex, fishing, sex, sports or sex. I have to make up something else when you ask, so don't ask. 
Because I'm a man, I do not want to visit your mother, or have your mother come visit us, or talk to her when she calls, or think about her any more than I have to. Whatever you got her for Mother's Day is okay; I don't need to see it. And don't forget to pick up something for my mother, too. 
Because I'm a man, you don't have to ask me if I liked the movie. Chances are, if you're crying at the end of it, I didn't...and if you are feeling amorous afterwards...then I will certainly at least remember the name and recommend it to others. 
Because I'm a man, I think what you're wearing is fine. I thought what you were wearing five minutes ago was fine, too. Either pair of shoes is fine. With the belt or without it, looks fine. Your hair is fine. You look fine. Can we just go now? 
Because I'm a man, and this is, after all, the year 2016() already, I will share equally in the housework. You just do the laundry, the cooking, the cleaning, the vacuuming, and the dishes, and I'll do the rest.... like wandering around in the garden with a beer, wondering what to do.

This has been a public service announcement for women to better understand men.!

title: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies
text:
I wonder if the magic spark can ever come back into my life? I often think about it........from time to time. Perhaps you might be thinking the same thing. 
Being a full time Single Dad, I have to admit, I truly love my child and there is nothing like it in this world. Simply nothing. 

My life is pretty normal. I take care of myself and my child to the best of my ability. My favorite store is Mariano's. I speak 3 languages and I am a pretty good cook. What I lack is a good woman who understands me and accepts me and my child for the lost souls that we are. 

Its funny but, it is finding that one person that when I look at her, words are hard to come out of my mouth. When I sit next to her, there is no need for words. Simply look into her eyes and two hearts feel it without one single word. Is it over for me? 
Is it even possible to find, or rediscover, and feel love again .
Is touching her going to be just as incredible as it once was in my life? 
Will my heart go nuts with a simple kiss? 
Will she have that effect on me?............Desire. 

How do we find that one? I Love dating.. When we were younger, it was SO easy to meet then let things all fall into place. Now, we put up all sorts of obstacles. 

My dream is to one day meet a female at a coffee shop and I find the courage to say, "excuse me, you are really pretty and I am finding it hard not to say anything". Would she smile, would she tell me where to go or would she simply look at me as if I was a ok? 
Do we go to a bar and flirt? Do we go to a restaurant and chat? Do we post something online? Do we try Internet dating? Who the heck knows? 
Me? I am a happy, well grounded, and content Dad. It would seem that I don't really need anything in my life. BUT, there is always that 'time', when I am alone that I think to myself, "could it be different'? I am stable, secure and most weeks, there are a couple of days I get lonely and find myself reading through these posts and wonder what it would be like to have someone come over for a drink and get to know each other. I think about it each week and do nothing about it. Today I am writing my thoughts on here. Obviously, there is a gap in my life. I have no clue what to do or how to do it........ I mean, filling that gap. 
What kind of Female do I truly adore? Being honest, that is easy for me to share: I love my female to be........... 
Stunning in my eyes both inside her heart and outside.... 
Extremely kind hearted, spiritual, and LOVES to feel true love........ 
Incredible at listening and communicating with everyone she comes into contact with.....
She loves and adores her family and ALWAYS puts them first..... 
She is well educated and a hard worker who sets goals and achieves them... 
Her integrity is through the roof and her friends/peers respect her..... 
She is down to earth, self-confident and can hold her own in any given situation.... 
as hers do
someway, bring her into my life, slowly, gently, most beautifully and most understandingly. 
True love. Is it still out there for those of us who are single ? 
If you took the time to read this dreary yet emotional outpouring, responses are not only welcome, they are desired.
I am ready to open up a part of my world that I closed off after my divorce. Why did I do that? I am not sure . A relationship at times doesn't seem possible BUT, if two people can start off with a deep desire to see each other once or even twice a week, that alone is so much better than not at all or sitting at home thinking about it. 
Just thoughts and desires. I have often thought about using a dating site but have not done that. If you have done that and had success, please let me know which ones to try. I would like to be a great addition to someone's life. Especially if you are close to your parents. 

Thank you for reading. I feel pretty nice getting my feelings out. As a Guy we are thought not to talk about stuff like this but I feel free now and I am to be able to write this , Although we may never meet, there is a tiny chance, we will. If you answered 'yes, that's me', to my little wish list, then we really should chat here. 
I am spiritual, spontaneous, ambitious yet non-materialistic, and truly try to seriously achieve all my goals. I am attractive, moderately attractive , caring, passionate, well educated and I have traveled a lot both here and overseas. I feel I have lots to offer the right female. So, to wrap this long thing up, what am I sure about? 
I hope one day to be wrapped up in someone's arms that I don't want to be without. When we ask ourselves one question, we get all the answers we need. That question is simple: Imagine my life with her in it. Now imagine my life without her in it. Which? 
Thank you kindly for reading. I hope I touched one heart that is in the same place as mine.
I leave you with one last thought......One heart. With so many people in this entire world, why, oh why is it SO hard to find our ONE HEART?
I don't want to give up on believing I can find you and you, me. 
YESTERDAY IS HISTORY , TOMORROW A MYSTERY, AND TODAY A GIFT.

title: A 25,000 RING, WILL YOU MARRY ME?
text:
Thank you for stopping by, I'm glad the title caught your attention. I tend to write a lot, so be prepared for a long read...

It's a beautiful morning, the house smells like sausage and coffee, I'm on my second cup, CNN is on in the background and I thought I'd post an ad to see if maybe perhaps I could find love :) LOL - Of course we would start off as friends and get to know each other and see what happens from there. No green card marriages please, unless you're super hot and want a real relationship.

I've been reading these posts for a while now and all I can do is shake my head at what this world has come to. I constantly see guys posting sugar-daddy ads and benefactor ads. 

Are there any decent men or women out there anymore I wonder to myself? I know these days a lot of women only go for the really good looking tall, dark and handsome guys. Funny thing is, most, if not all of these tall, dark and handsome men end up cheating on them or just use them for sex and treat them like dirt. I am not assuming this, I know this to be true because I have girlfriends who tell me. 

Now don't worry, although I am no Brad Pitt, I'm no Danny DeVito either..lol. I'm just an average uy next door who is very confident with his looks. I'm in my 30's, clean cut with no facial hair and a whole of fun!

I'm one of those guys who is truly a hopeless romantic. I already have my wedding day planned out if and when it ever happens...lol. I'm serious...a small to medium sized intimate wedding at a very nice resort like The Montage in Laguna Beach, or even somewhere exotic like Venice, Italy or even Tahiti, depending on what my future wife wants of course :). My wedding song would be an oldie but a goldie. Shania Twain's From This Moment On. Speaking of Shania, whenever I listen to her music, it brings me great joy and lifts me up and I fantasize about being married in a perfect marriage and how I finally have stopped searching for my mate. I have these dreams sometimes where I am married or in a great relationship and I get this overall feeling of great happiness. Its like feeling complete, its like I have finally found what I was searching for. You're gonna laugh but I watched this movie with my niece a while back called the Lizzie McGuire Movie and it had this really upbeat song. I think its called, "What Dreams are Made of". It goes something like this: 

I've got somewhere I belong 

I've got somebody to love 

This is what dreams are made of

I always think to myself, how lucky one must be to find that kind of love. Rent the movie, its really cute. And no, Im not gay, Im just not afraid to use that word and show my emotions and share my feelings. You're really going laugh when I tell you that I LOVE to drive fast on the freeway and rock out in the car while singing that song! LOL 

As to what I like: I am really into chick flicks, I also like action and brain-dead movies as well, but chick flicks are my fave. I also like to travel. Traveling is my all-time favorite thing to do. Whether it be on a weekend getaway to Big Bear, San Francisco (wine-tasting in Napa!), or a weekend in Vegas, I just love being out and about. Internationally, I have been to Europe and Asia and I plan on returning with YOU! Around town, I enjoy fine dining, movies, shopping, hiking, jogging, etc. 

I am financially secure and am very blessed to be a homeowner in and drive a few decent cars. Although I like nice things, I actually OWN my car and its not all some fake facade like most people these days with their leased c-class Mercedes on a zero down 84 month lease..lol 

Wow...are you still reading? If you are and you would like to meet a truly nice guy who is looking to meet a nice woman, please feel free to email me. 

As to the type of women I am attracted to: 

On the inside: 1) Honesty, without honesty, we have nothing. 

On the outside: Because I am not a big guy myself, I typically date short/petite women in their 20s to 30s. If you are able to walk around Disney-world with me, you are in unconditionally :) 

As for me: 

I am in my 30's, I'm clean cut, average build and a whole lot of fun!. I think if you have read every word of this ad, you already know whats on the inside : ) 

I know this is a long shot, but those are the type of bets I love to place in Vegas...Lol. Let's start with a chat on the phone, a quick bite, then upgrade to a day in Disney world and then Italy next summer where I'd propose to you in St. Peter's square and then dance under the stars with your tears of joy falling on my shoulders....that or have an awkward plane ride home...Lol again

Thanks for reading and feel free to attach a picture if you decide to say hello :) 

If you happen to be reading this ad from outside of IL and you're on the same page as I am in life, I would love for you to send me an email and tell me about yourself. Perhaps Sleepless in Seattle has me fantasizing about meeting some women from clear across the country...See, I told you I was a hopeless romantic :)

Just so I know you'e not a computer trying to sell me something, type in the name of your favorite ride in Disney World in the subject line of your email.

title: You'd be crazy or damaged to want me.
text:
This site has the been the basis of my sex and dating life for well over a decade. It's funny how you'll come across the same people here and on the shitty free dating sites still looking like they've always been, wondering why they can't, "find the right guy". The Internet is like this giant social experiment in its infancy and we're the first generation of guine pigs. As far as relationships go, I don't think it's going so well. "But my friend found her husband online and they're living happily ever after." Yes, your one individual example discounts the argument just like witnessing one, improbable coincidence proves it was, "God's grace". 

It's ok you're dysfunctional. It's ok the true love fantasy isn't in your cards. It's not really in anyone's, you just believe believe in fairytales at an advanced age. In reality a relationship is just an intricate game of give and take. In some the ratio is very lopsided and in others, it's pretty even. 

I'm a good guy in the fact that I'm never going to beat you. I'm never going to be cruel or scare you. I'd be nice to your kids. I wouldn't steal from or take advantage of you. I'm not going to fuck some random slut in your bed while you're at work. 

What scares and sickens me is that's a glowing endorsement to so many stupid women these days. Well, that's what they say they want, but invariably they'll find another scary, white trash junky just waiting for an opportunity to be alone with her 13 yo daughter. 

I'm not proud of much. I did have a very good thing going in life at one point, but in the end I was still me and that's what I couldn't handle. I can't regret the past or the choices I made because that person was bound to fuck things up one way or another. I think our free will is more of an illusion that we want to believe. We're objectively very predictable from a macro standpoint. More of a fixed track than an open road. 

I'm not bitter at the reality, I'm angry at the bullshit I was fed. I thought I could help someone change when in reality they're going to keep making the same mistakes until it kills them. I thought I was "in love" when in actuality it was a self-destructive obsession. I knew she was full of shit, batshit crazy, opiate dependent, non trustworthy, manipulative, self serving and incredibly immature. Like the emotional intelligence of a bratty, spoiled little girl. But who the fuck am I? Right? 

The misogynistic side of me will scold battered women for being so stupid for repeatedly subjecting themselves to the abuse. Then I realized how my situation paralleled theirs, I just didn't have any cuts or bruises jumping out at anyone. The damage was purely on my mental health and self worth as opposed to the wholistic approach the woman beaters use. 

I'm fat, dysfunctional, I don't fully support myself, not too much going on in any facet of my life, undereducated, and difficult to employ. If I'm not constantly checking and challenging my thoughts I'm a cruel knowitall. I'm fully able to get it together, I just don't know if it sounds worthwhile. That the incremental amount of happiness it'd bring is worth the risk or headache. 

Seriously, I'm not your existential anti-hero and I'd hold it against you if you were into me. I don't think I have too much to worry about 😊

*edit- I just proofread what I wrote and yes, I'm cringing every other sentence as well.

title: Fun! Fun! Fun! (Seriously, fun!)
text:
Hello there!

I am a 35 year old, 5'10", healthy living and fun man. The cup is always half to at least three and a half quarters full with me. I enjoy many, many things such as staying in shape (with all things outdoorsy and the gym), traveling around the world (and US road trips), cooking (definitely a plus if you do too), and going to concerts whenever I get the chance. However, there is so much more. Seeing that I have been around the world along with the US, I tend to think that I have seen so much and yet there are so many more adventures to come. I tend to be a very positive person and I always seem to be smiling, which is never a bad thing in my eyes 

A few more things about me as well:

- College Educated
- Great group of friends
- Athletic
- I own my tuxedo and it has come in handy at the CSO red carpet affair, masquerade balls and many other events.
- Well traveled with many countries and 49 states under my belt.
- I live in Lakeview, but I do have a car.
- I am an avid sand volleyball player. Bummer that winter is here. Care to grab a coffee or hot chocolate?
- I would rather be dancing and listening to music then staring at the TV for hours at a time. Life's too short to be inside (except in the winters of Chicago. Ouch!)

Now, how about you...

You shouldn't take life so seriously. You know when to just relax but can also get decked out for a night on the town. You are hopefully an adventurous type, believing that looking and feeling healthy are important aspects and are up for anything (perhaps twice if it's that fun). You would love to be there when times are amazing, but also have an open heart when times are tougher. You naturally smile and love to laugh (because I love to joke around). A perfect date could be anything from a nice night out with dinner and wine, hopping into a dive bar to hear the live music, relaxing around a campfire, hitting up a Cubs game, live band karaoke or throwing a Frisbee on the beach. Of course, if your entire way of life were to fit in this box, what would there be left to discover? If this at all peaks your interest, I hope to hear from you!

Now comes the tough part. Thanks to being in a previous relationship with a girl that didn't know her status, I was blessed with HSV2. Yes, most of you are running away now. I get it. It's the stigma that I have to deal with for the rest of my life. However, I don't have breakouts because I take care of myself which leads to a .04% chance of getting it. Even so, it's your choice.

I am glad to share pictures if you are seriously interested. I can tell you that without being conceited I have been told that I am an attractive man. I keep myself in shape and I am put together very well. I think you will be pleasantly surprised if you actually want to start up what could be an amazing something or other.

Have a wonderful day! Also, be sure to put your favorite season (i.e. summer, fall, spring, etc.) in the subject box so I can weed out the spam.

Sincerely yours...

title: Are you emotionally abusive?
text:
It's hard for me to admit this, but here's the conclusion I've come to: I am deeply drawn to women who are emotionally abusive. 

You know who you are. There are different levels. Maybe you manipulate, maybe you lie, maybe your emotional life is a roller coaster, and you drag your partner along with for all the highs and lows, peaks and valleys. 

You cheat, and don't feel badly about it. You tell your partner about it, defiantly. You fucked someone else. So what?

Who knows where it comes from? Just because your life might look like massive drama from the outside doesn't mean that you don't have love to give. It just comes out in different ways.

Here's the thing: I more than kind of love it. I do love it, and am drawn to the abuse. I can take it. I'm thick-skinned. Go on your rampages, emotional or otherwise. Have your freedom. Want me in your way? I'll get in your way. Want me out of it? I'll gladly step aside. 

But after it's over, I'll be there to help you clean up and tell you how amazing you are. And I'll mean it.

I've been told I'm a catch. Smart, cute, fit, funny, successful. Why not go for someone "like you?" friends ask.

The truth is that I'm me, and you're the kind of woman I'm drawn to. That's just how it is, and I am finally embracing this fact. 

It can work. I'm not going to try and change you.

So, if this describes you at all, and if you want to be with someone you don't have to explain your "quirks" to whatsoever--take a chance, drop me a note. Who knows the fun we can have!

I'm hot, I should take advantage of it." I've also been asked, "If you're so great, why do you need to offer a bribe?" I don't know. It's fun. It puts me in charge and tempts you and makes this illicit and that makes us conspirators, which is a turn on. Who knows? The heart wants what the heart wants, eh?

Anyway, I'm professional and funny and a good speller and private and generally a good dude. title: One More "First Kiss"
text:
Right up front, this posting is a long shot. What I seek is that rare chemistry between two people that makes minds wander and builds on itself, creating anticipation for every next step in the relationship. Whenever we find it, it is that first kiss we always remember more than anything else, because if we do it right that's the thing we waited for. 

I am an attractive, professional and highly educated guy with lots of interests, a fantastic sense of humor and a very sensitive side. My work and personal life keep me busy almost all of the time, and the responsibility I carry isolates me and makes me lonely even when I am with people. I want somebody who knows this feeling and needs a strong friendship in her life to give her a safe place to turn when the rest of the world just expects too much. I will give you that. In return I want the same kind of friendship, and regardless of how reckless it may seem I want to fall in love with you, stare into your eyes and know you are feeling the same thing. While physical attraction is a must, physical affirmation of the feelings is less important. If you are attached and can't follow through there will be no change in the way I feel about you or see you - rules are rules. I need your heart, your smile and your caring way more than I need your body. When you are with me in body or in spirit you will know you are beautiful, special and worshiped for who you are. When I am with you in body or in spirit I will know there is someone who cares about me, not what I can or cannot give them and only because she wants to.

You can be roughly my age or as young as you can be and still know what you want from this type of friendship. You can be any race. You need only be attractive to me (feel free to ask questions - I am not that picky but we all have our things) and be yourself. I will say that generally I am attracted to personality more than looks, but fitness is important to me. A nice body trumps fabulous shoes and hair! "Clicking" will require you are concerned with physical fitness, exercise and the outdoors. You have to be interested in something other than reality TV and it would be great if you enjoy witty banter and understand sarcasm. Be available to text message at different times in the day, and have maybe one day or evening a month you can sneak away for a drink and some laughs.

I have been privileged to have chatted with some very sweet and interesting ladies as a result of this post, I just have not been lucky enough yet to find the "one". I feel compelled to keep trying! 

Let's find each other and make some happiness in life, even if just for a while.

title: More than a FWB
text:
So I found myself bored today with nothing much to do. I've been clicking around the internet when I thought, eh, why not try CL. Maybe there is someone out there who is in the same boat. 

But I suppose I should get down to business. I know the purpose of these ads is to be direct and straight to the point but that always seemed so cold to me. Honestly, there is a reason why I'm posting in this section but truthfully, I want something a little more than just a simple FWB. This is where you would say, "Then post in a different section." Well this is where I feel conflicted. See, I'm not really looking for a relationship either and I wouldn't want to give off the wrong impression. I want something in-between those two. Maybe like someone who is funny and I can stand to have an actual conversation with... in addition to having filthy and animalistic dirty sex with in the bedroom. 

I know the ads without pictures are sketchy, and while I have plenty of pictures there are too many people from my business and personal world that would love nothing more than to see this ad of mine and post it all over the office. 
So, I will make these promises: I am not overweight. I am not bald or balding. I am not a stage 5 clinger or creeper. Well... maybe a little bit of a creep, but just enough to keep it fun. I mean, come on. We're both here on CL in this section. I think that says a little something about us. I am hight/weight proportionate. By most conventional standards I am attractive. I can hold a fairly intelligent conversation. I have no problem getting and maintaining an erection. I am not some two-pump chump and I don't fuck like a rabbit. 

So I'll just be sitting here on my couch lounging around if you feel the urge to send me an email. Please send me a picture and where you're from and we can go from there. 
Oh, and no dudes, please.

title: Bet you haven't read one like this.
text:
I suppose this is the part where I tell you how amazing I am and really sell it by almost making you feel like you're missing out if you don't respond to my ad but lets be honest here, while sure I am definitely awesome and charming, I really am just another guy. One that you pass on the street every day. Maybe some of you give a second glance because you think I'm cute. Maybe you like my jeans or my haircut. Maybe you think all the tattoos make me "dangerous yet intriguing," or maybe you just look at me and think, "I wonder what that guy does in his spare time." We all people watch. Last week I sat in the window of a local Starbucks watching people walk past and I thought to myself, "Each one of these people have a life. One that I will never know." You ever wonder about people, strangers, each one of us, as we pass by the window and wonder if the people sitting there drinking their pumpkin spice lattes think the same of us? Okay, now I'm just rambling. 

Either way, I'm a pretty decent dude. I'm not fat or gross or balding. I'm fairly well read and traveled and I think meeting a stranger is far more exciting than sitting around binge watching Making A Murderer. 
So what am I looking for? Someone who isn't so bitter that they have given up. Someone who can take a joke. And someone who is just as comfortable stuffing out faces with pizza on the couch as they are being adventurous in bed. I guess we're all just looking for a healthy balance, right? 

And sure, I know not posting a picture is lame but I promise you I'm not gross. You send me one and I'll send you. See, it's like we're back on the playground in 5th grade. "You give it first." "No, YOU!"

Oh, look at all the fun we're having already.

title: Real Talk
text:
Writing these things is always difficult for me. Or at least i should say writing something decent and expressing myself properly is difficult for me. I never know where to start or what to say. I don't always know how to convey my thoughts and emotions in to words. I usually just write those generic few sentences of meaningless bullshit posts. But i'm going to try my best to give you something real this time.

I am just another guy. I like girls. I like tech. I like animals. I like good food. I like fun and excitement. But at the same time, i'm not quite like the other guys. I don't chase skirts. I don't date. I don't drink. I don't smoke. I don't enjoy sports. I don't do alot of the things most guys do. I don't see things the same way most guys do. I don't have the same emotions most guys do. It's like i am walking my own path in a world i can't relate to. The lone wolf without a pack. I have been self sufficient my whole life. I don't need anybody. I have proved this to myself. But that doesn't mean i don't want somebody. Most of the time i am completely content. But if i think about it long enough i have to admit to myself i am lonely sometimes.

I can do without alot of things and function just fine. But i feel like standing alone and facing the world by myself is holding me back. There is love and affection and compassion and the potential for greatness inside me that is unable to shine as bright as i know i can. I could be doing so much more with myself. I could be enjoying every day of my life instead of just getting through another day. I could be meeting new people and making new friends. I could be making a difference. I could be the change i want to see in the world.

Even though i know i can make it by myself, i can not do all the things i want to do by myself. I can not experience the emotions i want to experience by myself. I will never find the happiness i know is out there by myself. As painful as it is for me to admit to myself, i need good people in my life. I need at least one person i know i can count on no matter what. Somebody who makes my days brighter. Somebody who keeps me warm on cold and lonely nights. Somebody i can love with all my heart and soul. Somebody i would not trade for even all the riches in the world. Somebody i can share life with. Somebody i would do anything for just to see her look in my eyes and smile at me.

Listening to these emotions and watching them form in to words as i type them on a screen is a trip to say the least. I know these emotions are there. But i never share them with anybody. As i read my own words and think about putting this online with hopes of finding that magical person that makes me feel alive i feel like i am just day dreaming and reaching for heaven. I am well aware my chances of finding who i am looking for is slim. But i also have to admit to myself that if i never reach out for somebody nobody will ever reach back and grab my hand.

So here i am. Playing the CL lottery and putting my heart on the table for all to see. To be honest, i'm not sure how i should feel about this. I'm not sure what i am looking for. I'm not sure if i should be hopeful. I'm not sure if this would be considered verbal diarrhea or too much information. I'm not sure if i should edit this and keep my words to a minimum or leave it exactly the way it came out. My attitude has always been whatever towards life so i guess that's how i should look at this too. No expectations. No hopes. No strings. Just whatever. So ya, here you go. This is my attempt at a decent post with real talk. I hope you enjoyed my rant and you find what you are looking for. I wish peace love and all that good shit for all of you that actually read all of my nonsense.
